title: Software Engineer
subtitle: August 2020 - Present | San Francisco
description: Designed, developed, and productionized a reimagined developer experience built on Kubernetes. Built with custom operators and cli, developers can develop faster on remote clusters instead of local laptops. Led the development of and initiative to use feature flags in microservices. Wrote SDKs in Java and Ruby. Deployed proxies for performance improvement and reliability.
